verbs.description: irate passenger screams to [V: be] let off plane after flight makes emergency landing a houston flight to minneapolis took a terrifying turn when a passenger started screaming to be let off the plane it happened when the flight was delayed and diverted due to another passenger in need of medical assistance houston spirit airlines landing stephanie calder rochester minnesota george bush intercontinental airport minneapolis
